title: 4/27 - Openbucks Payment Method Temporarily Disabled
body:
*** Update 5:40pm PDT ***

The payment option has been re-enabled in the store! If you run into any issues, let us know. 

*** Update Above ***

Hey everyone,

The Openbucks payment method, such as [Subway/Shell and other retailer Gift Cards](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks) has been temporarily disabled due to maintenance with our payment provider. Unfortunately, there is no estimate for when the service will be restored. In the meantime however, you can use an alternative payment method such as Paypal or prepaid RP cards.

We'll provide some updates in this thread once this gets resolved!

replies.body:
Please fix asap I want to use my 35 dollar already.
Can't eat Subway for a week.
yeah.... can u guys post it like a week ago before we buy the gift card... this is so.. like it suddenly just come up{{summoner:4}}
But the thing is that day u wouldve said this or someone if they bought a card that day LOL

Hey All,

Openbucks was re-enabled just now. Let us know if you see any further issues with this payment option!
It is back up for me
Do you know approximately when it's coming back up because I wanted to {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:32}} {{summoner:12}}  into chest openings
Any info on this? It's been way too long... doesn't seem like a big issue to solve imo
Would it be at all possible to extend the sales on the current skins + champions until this is resolved? I had a 5$ card I was going to use to get Warring Kingdoms Katirina....
$50 subway card sitting here. Feels{{champion:32}} Man. Can't wait for openbucks to be back.

i buyed yesterday 100 dollars for subway gifcard for buy riot points now im off work im home RIGHT NOW ready FOR BUY MY riots points and buy more hextech chests and wait other day cuz u cant only buy 2 bundles de 10 chest for day, now u tellme  OPENBUCKS is no avaliablee.... MY GOD... i hope u guys dont take out tha OPTION!..

> [{quoted}](name=IsMeSexyboy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gzuolbwT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-27T21:44:07.669+0000)
>
> i buyed yesterday 100 dollars for subway gifcard for buy riot points now im off work im home RIGHT NOW ready FOR BUY MY riots points and buy more hextech chests and wait other day cuz u cant only buy 2 bundles de 10 chest for day, now u tellme  OPENBUCKS is no avaliablee.... MY GOD... i hope u guys dont take out tha OPTION!..


The option won't be taken out permanently. We'll work with the payment provider to get this back up asap.
Thanks for letting us know! Hope it's back up pretty soon!

I..... have only ways left to pay with gift card.... rito pls
{{item:3070}} {{champion:15}} {{item:3070}}

literally on my way home, i bought a Subway gift card, and I get home wondering why the gift card payment method wasn't up on the purchase IP menu. this explains it. I'm glad you sent out some big red alerts on your site. I looked it up and couldn't find anything and I get on here and it was in red. I kind of feel like an idiot for not checking the people who know the most about the game first.
I also bought some subway cards for RP, hoping its back up soon as of today.
